content:
Could we have some kind of warning if someone r+es a pr marked as draft?
I had pr that I marked as draft because I was not sure if it was ready or not, and bors totally ignored that :sweat_smile:

There is already a check for wip/todo/do not merge in the pr title. This can probably be extended. https://github.com/rust-lang/homu/blob/96739f859f4d56edef9a3d6255426722f61f4a54/homu/main.py#L532-L544
